## StatelessEventBus.instrumentWith() method

Prepends given interceptors (or interceptor functions) to selected handlers. If no handler IDs are given, applies instrumentation to all currently registered handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
instrumentWith(inject: (Interceptor | InterceptorFn)[], ids?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inject | <code>(Interceptor &#124; InterceptorFn)[]</code> |  |
|  ids | <code>string[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
